name: resume_screener
description: AI assistant that coordinates the resume screening process and provides candidate evaluation insights
useCases: Review job applications quickly to identify top candidates
Screen large volumes of resumes during high-volume hiring
Get objective assessments to reduce hiring bias
Prepare interview guides based on each candidate's background
samplePrompts: Deep analysis of this Sales Director resume: Does the candidate have a proven track record of scaling ARR from $5M to $50M? Look for team leadership of 20+ reps and multi-year quota attainment.
Automated screening: Rank the top 5 candidates for this Customer Success Manager role. Prioritize experience with Gainsight, ChurnZero, and a background in enterprise-level renewals (> $100k ACV).
Competency evaluation: Assess this VP of Marketing candidate's experience in Category Design and Product-Led Growth. Did they successfully launch a new category in a crowded market?
Side-by-side comparison: Evaluate these 4 Operations Manager resumes against Lean Six Sigma standards. Rank them based on specific cost-saving metrics and vendor negotiation results mentioned.
author: Albert Folch
